verses.name: Hosea 1:4
verses.text: And the Lord said unto him, Call his name Jezreel; for yet a little while, and I will avenge the blood of Jezreel upon the house of Jehu, and will cause to cease the kingdom of the house of Israel.

verses.name: Hosea 1:5
verses.text: And it shall come to pass at that day, that I will break the bow of Israel in the valley of Jezreel.

verses.name: Hosea 1:6
verses.text: And she conceived again, and bare a daughter. And God said unto him, Call her name Lo–ruhamah: for I will no more have mercy upon the house of Israel; but I will utterly take them away.
